item.title: Quest Page Format
item.content:encoded:
I thought I'll just make a thread on the matter as it is not effective via PM.

Here is a preview (updated):
Jonin Ascension Season 2

As I see it, it can have a change and that is on the Headings.

Option 1:

Continue Quest >

Part 1

Something something
extra

Option 2:

Continue Quest >

Part 1

Something something
extra

The color code for the Quest Requirements box can be obtained from the BvS page Source Code. If you don't know how to do it I'll post the method.

The red isn't actually red. Here is the code to it:

 ##A10000|**Hand over 5 Apples >**##

This is what you get:
Hand over 5 Apples >
